statements: SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000.00;
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT project_name, end_date, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE funding_amount < 5000 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_amount, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-08-01' AND end_date >= '2022-08-01'
SELECT pr.project_id, pr.report_date, pr.report_description, pr.impact_rating, p.project_name FROM project_reports pr INNER JOIN projects p ON pr.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM funded_projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM funded_projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM funded_projects INNER JOIN project_reports ON funded_projects.project_id = project_reports.project_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(impact_id) AS total_impacts FROM funded_projects LEFT JOIN project_impact ON funded_projects.project_id = project_impact.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, impact_description, impact_date FROM project_impact JOIN funded_projects ON project_impact.project_id = funded_projects.project_id WHERE funded_projects.funding_amount >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM funded_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM funded_projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM funded_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT funded.project_id, impact.impact_description FROM funded_projects funded JOIN project_impact impact ON funded.project_id = impact.project_id;
SELECT * FROM funded_projects ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 5000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM projects INNER JOIN project_activities ON projects.project_id = project_activities.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, funding_amount FROM projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM projects JOIN project_activities ON projects.project_id = project_activities.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_activities > 3;
SELECT project_name, member_name, role FROM projects JOIN project_members ON projects.project_id = project_members.project_id WHERE role = 'Project Manager' ORDER BY project_name, member_name;

SELECT project_name, report_date, impact_description FROM projects JOIN project_impact_reports ON projects.project_id = project_impact_reports.project_id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, funding_amount FROM funded_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM project_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, activity_description FROM project_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_role, participant_contact FROM project_participants WHERE participant_role = 'Manager';
SELECT project_id, project_name, funding_source, funding_amount FROM funded_projects;
SELECT project_name, funding_source, funding_amount FROM funded_projects WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY funding_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM funded_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_name, participant_name, participant_role FROM funded_projects INNER JOIN project_participants ON funded_projects.project_id = project_participants.project_id WHERE participant_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY project_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_name, activity_name, activity_date FROM funded_projects INNER JOIN project_activities ON funded_projects.project_id = project_activities.project_id WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT project_name, expense_description, expense_amount FROM funded_projects INNER JOIN project_expenses ON funded_projects.project_id = project_expenses.project_id WHERE expense_amount < 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC LIMIT 5;
